channel.title: Full Browser on Joone Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Full Browser on Joone Blog

item.title: Real Full Browsing in Korea
item.description: LG Telelcom, the smallest of three telecom operators in Korea launched mobile full browsing service with an attractive fixed-rate plan that allows unlimited data download within 6 month and 1G bytes after then for 6,000 won ($6) per month.
